document_data.name: Black Star Gate
document_data.Description: The gate transported people from [[Elbulder]]'s ruins, in a location where they crossed the [[Old Road]], the [[River Arran]], to a tomb-knoll in the [[marsh of Chelimber]]. It activated when people carried black rocks such as [[jet]] or [[obsidian]].
document_data.History: Its name came from a record in an old book in [[Candlekeep]].
